q1: Will the timer work if I switch tabs?
a1: Yes, the timer uses the system clock for timing so it remains accurate even when the tab is not active.
q2: Does the timer make a sound when it finishes?
a2: Yes, an audio notification plays when the countdown reaches zero to alert you.
q3: Can I pause and resume the timer?
a3: Yes, you can pause the timer at any point and resume it without losing your remaining time.
